programme.title: Golden Memories Asia Ep27
programme.desc: Golden Memories Asia merupakan acara pencarian bakat untuk menyanyikan lagu-lagu nostalgia atau lagu lama dari tahun 1970-an hingga 2000-an, dihadiri oleh enam negara Asia Tenggara iaitu Brunei Darussalam, Indonesia, Malaysia, Filipina, Singapura, dan Timor Leste. Program ini adalah untuk memupuk kegembiraan dan keseronokan, serta satu bentuk persahabatan antara negara.

programme.title: Architecture 101
programme.desc: An architect gets an unexpected visit by his first love whom he hasn't seen in many years, bringing back all the memories from when they first met 15 years ago.

programme.title: Door Lock
programme.desc: A woman, living by herself, finds her door lock cover left open one day. Startled by this, she starts investigating on her own and finds more hints of someone trying to enter her home.

programme.title: The Goblin
programme.desc: After ten years in jail, Doohyun is released and wants nothing more than to live an ordinary life, but when his old partner kidnaps his daughter, the long-hidden Goblin inside him awakes.

programme.title: Our School's E.T.
programme.desc: Seong Geun is content with being a P.E teacher, but the school wants to sack him in favor for an English teacher. To survive, he must teach English - but he doesn't speak a word of it.

programme.title: Pain
programme.desc: A debt collector who has lost his sense of pain after a traumatic accident during his youth falls for a street vendor who suffers from severe hemophilia.

programme.title: My Sassy Girl
programme.desc: A young man sees a drunk, cute woman standing too close to the tracks at a metro station in Seoul and pulls her back. She ends up getting him into trouble repeatedly after that, starting on the train.

programme.title: Emergency Declaration
programme.desc: Mysterious deaths on plane forced the pilot to call for an unconditional emergency landing.

programme.title: Hot Young Bloods
programme.desc: In a rural town in 1982, a tough young girl secretly has a crush on a playboy. When a transfer student arrives, the playboy falls in love with her causing unexpected chaos at school.

programme.title: Detective K: Secret Of Virtuous Widow
programme.desc: Joseon's top detective investigates a series of mysterious murders plaguing the country, uncovering disturbing secrets that link the murders to a massive conspiracy that will shake the whole nation.

programme.title: Hwayi: A Monster Boy
programme.desc: A boy raised by five fathers attached to the criminal world is about to discover the sinister truth about his past when he is forced to pull the trigger when he tags along with his fathers on a job.

programme.title: Secret Reunion
programme.desc: A NIS agent is discharged after failing to stop the murder of a N. Korean dissident. Years later, he bumps into the N. Korean spy who was involved in the mission and quickly forms a bond.

programme.title: Our School's E.T.
programme.desc: Seong Geun is content with being a P.E teacher, but the school wants to sack him in favor for an English teacher. To survive, he must teach English - but he doesn't speak a word of it.

programme.title: The Divine Move
programme.desc: Go player Tae Seok is framed and imprisoned for his brother's death after losing a high-stakes game. After his sentence, he sets out for revenge against the underground gambler who destroyed his life.

programme.title: Marriage Blue
programme.desc: The misadventures of 4 couples a week before their wedding.

programme.title: South Bound
programme.desc: Choi Hae-gap has a family who will stand by his decisions given any scenario. As a team, they fight the government's plans to build a resort on the island of their ancestors.

programme.title: Don'T Go Too Far
programme.desc: While arguing on the division of their father's ₩2B inheritance, the eldest brother received a call to realize his son was kidnapped, and the ransom demanded was ₩2B...

programme.title: War Of The Arrows
programme.desc: Set during the second Manchu invasion of Korea, Nam Yi, the best archer in Korea, goes up against the Qing Dynasty to rescue his younger sister Ja In - who was to be enslaved by the Manchurians.

programme.title: Men Of Plastic
programme.desc: A natural-born networker spot potential for business when he met a top plastic surgeon by chance. Together, they decided to open a whole new era of Apgujeong.

programme.title: Iris: New Generation
programme.desc: Three years after a secret agent's tragic death at the hands of terrorist group IRIS, team leader Joon-han recruits a team to stop IRIS once and for all.

programme.title: Life Is Beautiful
programme.desc: Se-yeon, devoted her entire life to her family, suddenly learns she is gravely ill. Now she is determined to live for herself more than ever and looks for her first love with the help of her husband.

programme.title: Train To Busan
programme.desc: While a zombie-virus breaks out in South Korea, passengers including a father and young daughter, a couple, and several students struggle to survive on the train from Seoul to Busan.

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep34
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep46284629
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1817
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3614
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2045
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Blessing of Formosa(T) Ep157
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: The Infernal Walker
programme.desc: Ting is an undercover police who infiltrates a triad and Tuen is a triad mole being planted into the police force. While Tang is tired of being an undercover cop, Tuen wishes to quit the triad and become a real police. When the triad boss sets a trap to uncover the moles' identity, the two must fight for themselves.

programme.title: Adventure of the King
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor Zhengde flees the palace to see the world after his mother orders him to marry an ugly princess. He disguises as a commoner and escapes with his advisors, but a gambling mishap causes them to part ways and Zhengde lost all his money. Phoenix, the owner of Lung Fung Inn, takes him in out of pity, and thus begins his new adventure...

programme.title: The Way We Keep Dancing
programme.desc: This sequel of “The Way We Dance” features the plight of Hong Kong’s grassroots performing artists as they fight against the government’s plan to gentrify an industrial district where they settled in.

programme.title: Operation Bangkok
programme.desc: A military veteran, Wu Wei and an undercover cop, Tian Ming lead a team to rescue the hostages captured by a band of thugs in an island outside of Bangkok. As they are about to leave after the rescue, Wu finds that his daughter is also kidnapped, and decides to stay on with Ming to fight the thugs and save her.

programme.title: Distinction
programme.desc: A music teacher in a special needs school, an underachiever from an elite school, and a rebellious teenager with a handicapped brother take part in a campus musical for various reasons. Little did they know that this turns out to be a journey of self-discovery.

programme.title: True Legend
programme.desc: Su Can was once a top general but choose to return to his hometown to study martial arts and enjoy family time with his wife and son. However, his wife was killed and the family became victims of conspiracies. Su was heartbroken and wandered like a beggar with his son. One day, he met the "God of Martial Arts" and learnt Drunken Fist from him.

programme.title: Kungfu Stuntmen
programme.desc: Hong Kong action cinema is famous for its real kung fu moves performed by a group called “Kung Fu Stuntmen”. This docu-film pays tribute to the generations of kung fu stuntmen, with the crew spending over two years digging archives and interviewing many talents, including the most prominent masters like Jackie Chan, Donnie Yen and Sammo Hung.

programme.title: I Fine… Thank You… Love You
programme.desc: Pleng, an English tutor, helps her student to pass a break up message in English to her boyfriend Gym. Gym knows nothing about English but wants to win back his girlfriend from the US, so he asks Pleng to teach him. Boorish and a slow learner, Gym makes many hilarious mistakes when learning English and ends up falling for Pleng.

programme.title: Project Gutenberg
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police hunts for a counterfeiting gang led by a mastermind known as Painter. The gang is so skillful that it's almost impossible to distinguish between its counterfeit currency and real money. In an effort to find Painter's real identity, the Police recruits artist Lee Man to assist in solving the case.

programme.title: A Murder Erased
programme.desc: Police officer Choi is assigned to a death scene investigation where the deceased body had laid undiscovered for eight years. A prosecutor joins the investigation after Choi has identified the suspect, and finds Choi’s actions suspicious when all manner of inconsistencies come to light from his statement...

programme.title: Pursuit of a Killer
programme.desc: Fei hates his father and to inherit his fortune, hires a killer to kill him. When he finds out his sister is the heiress to the fortune, Fei wants to kill her too...

programme.title: The Big Call
programme.desc: A young policeman goes undercover to try and capture a criminal group specializing in mobile fraud who has swindled hundreds of millions of yuan from business tycoons and ordinary people.

programme.title: See You Tomorrow
programme.desc: In this chaotic world, every city has its own "navigators" who can help solve various relationship issues. Bar owner Chen and his partner Guan are legendary navigators, but in the process of helping a girl Xiao Yu, they must also face their own problems in an epic act of self-discovery that brings their lives from towering highs to withering lows.

programme.title: Detective Chinatown 3
programme.desc: After the events in Bangkok and New York, Tang Ren and Qin Feng are invited to solve a murder case in Tokyo, but it turns out to be a challenge for the world’s best detectives. While the case has become complicated and confusing since the world’s top detective Q got involved, a hilarious challenge for the best detectives in Asia has just begun…

programme.title: Love on a Diet
programme.desc: Mini's broken heart leads her to pack on the pounds. She meets an obese man named Fatso who helps her get back on track and shed the pounds. After dropping the unwanted heft, Mini rekindles her relationship with her first love, but is this the happy ending that she wants?

programme.title: Trivisa
programme.desc: In the beginning of 1997, Hong Kong's three notorious thieves who have never met one another before appear in the same restaurant. This leads to a rumour that they are joining forces to pull off something big before the Handover, though this is not something that any of them is aware of.

programme.title: CZ12
programme.desc: Hawk leads a mercenary team to recover the bronze heads of the 12 Chinese zodiac animals, which were looted by foreigners in the 1800s. With a promise of a 10 times bonus by MP Corp if he can recover all of them, Hawk stops at nothing to accomplish the mission.

programme.title: 77 Heartwarmings
programme.desc: After breaking up with Adam, Eva focuses on her career but Adam still wants to make up and tries to move her 77 times. Things become more complicated when a Thai movie idol courts Eva. It is at this time that Eva’s mother becomes very ill, and she considers marriage in order to fulfil her mother’s wish. Will Adam succeed in warming Eva’s heart?

programme.title: Firestorm
programme.desc: Lu Ming Zhe is a senior police inspector who has repeatedly solved major cases in Hong Kong. When confronting the head of the gangster in the street one day, Lu was distracted and sabotaged by his childhood friend who has just been released from prison. Facing continuous provocation by criminal gangs, Lu vows to eliminate them at all costs.

programme.title: Fatal Visit
programme.desc: Yanny leaves Hong Kong for San Jose to visit her old friend Ling. Ling and her husband Tang seems to live an ideal and carefree life. However, during her five-day stay, Yanny uncovers the truth behind the façade as she reveals the unspeakable secrets that will propel all three down a fatal path of destruction.

programme.title: Rhapsody of Kidnapping
programme.desc: When three tech founders end up handing over their latest inventions to a sleazy tycoon who takes them for granted, they decide to kidnap the man’s wife, mistress, love child and his grandma for a huge ransom. Little did they expect that the heartless tycoon has hired an assassin to take them out instead of paying the ransom.

programme.title: Wo Hu
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police has placed more than a thousand undercover officers in various triad groups to bring down the largest criminal organization in Hong Kong. Betrayal, deceit and murder bring this group of "brothers" into a collision with the law and with each other!

programme.title: Bodies at Rest
programme.desc: When three armed criminals barge into a morgue, a forensic doctor and his student must fight with their lives to stop the criminals from obtaining a bullet from inside a corpse that is a key piece of evidence in a deadly crime.

programme.title: I'm Livin' It
programme.desc: Once a successful banker, Bowen now spends his nights in a 24-hour fast food joint where he meets a group of homeless people. Together they strive to get themselves out of rock bottom.

programme.title: Temporary Family
programme.desc: Hong Kong residential property is reported to be the most expensive in the world. Four young Hong Kong residents, each having their own issues, fall into a property speculation trap and are forced to live together in their new flat.

programme.title: Fearless
programme.desc: This movie is inspired by the true story of real-life hero Huo Yuan Jia. When a fight destroys the reputation of this renowned martial arts champion along with the lives of his family, Huo’s path to redemption brings him face-to-face with the most ferocious opponents in the world.

programme.title: My Prince Edward
programme.desc: A newly engaged Hong Kong woman tries to rid herself of a secret sham marriage to a mainlander that she was paid for years ago, before she can get married for real. Winner of Best Original Film Score and Best New Director at the 39th Hong Kong Film Awards.

programme.title: The Incredible Monk
programme.desc: Daoji, a mystic monk during the Southern Song dynasty, has been tasked to protect the people from monsters. However, when the Emperor dies under suspicious circumstances, Daoji uncovers an evil conspiracy and must seek help from the Emperor of the Gods and five of the strongest demigods to combat the dark forces threatening the world!

programme.title: Bleeding Steel
programme.desc: A Hong Kong police inspector, Lin Dong, had to protect an important witness in his mission thirteen years ago. This not only forced him to be separated from his daughter, but also got him involved in a conspiracy spanning more than a decade.

programme.title: Fall in Love at First Kiss
programme.desc: In this romantic love story starring Taiwanese actors Darren Wang and Jelly Lin, an ordinary girl develops a stubborn crush on the school genius after an unexpected kiss. But with the genius adored by everyone in the school, can their relationship blossom and develop?

programme.title: I Love You, You're Perfect, Now Change!
programme.desc: Catch this comedy-musical adapted from the Broadway classic I LOVE YOU, YOU’RE PERFECT, NOW CHANGE – consisting of 12 independent stories from the viewpoints of individuals, families and societies all exploring the timeless theme of love!

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Hong Kong
programme.desc: This is a story of ICAC investigators fighting against rampant corruption in early 1970s’ Hong Kong. A police sergeant teams up with a triad boss to make billions of dollars in bribes. As a lawyer joins his friend in ICAC to investigate their collusion and fight against corruption, the battle between the righteous and the wicked has just begun.

programme.title: The Tigress Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Sam is being hunted as he discovers that the mayor and the chief of medical bureau are colluding with a drug dealer. He is saved by a fishermen family and works in their friend’s grocery but the grocery owner is killed when the enemies track Sam down. Sam escapes to Shaolin to learn the cudgel style of kung fu in order to avenge his friends.

programme.title: Les Belles
programme.desc: Acknowledged as one of the greatest Hong Kong musicals, this lavish movie starring Linda Lin, who won Best Actress for her performance, infuses its wispy plot with style and wit, and the results are pure pleasure.

programme.title: Heroes Shed No Tears
programme.desc: Kao Chien Fei is a young swordsman who wields a special sword with a teardrop marked on its blade. He is charged with averting an impending crisis in the martial arts world, but the villain, Zhou Tung Lai, wishes to become the ruler in the martial arts world, and launches a scheme to pit the various heroes against one another.

programme.title: The Warlord
programme.desc: A bandit became a warlord in northern China by helping Russia fight against Japan. Due to his ignorance and silly behaviour, he is seen as a joke to everyone. The warlord is finally killed by the daughter of a troupe master whom he had killed for no reason, bringing a befitting end to a traitor.

programme.title: Killers Five
programme.desc: The Duke’s daughter has been kidnapped by the notorious Golden Dragon Hill bandits. A swordman named Yue Zhen Bei is assigned to save her, and expecting many dangers on the journey, Yue garners help from a group of good friends who are also kung fu masters.

programme.title: The Emperor And The Minister
programme.desc: The ingenious imperial scholar Liu Yung always embarrasses Emperor Chien Lung with his quick wit and gift of gab. The emperor purposely sets him up to solve the seemingly unsolvable. However, Liu Yung resolves it easily with wit and style and foils the emperor’s plot once again.

programme.title: Dirty Ho
programme.desc: Master Wang, who is actually the 11th prince, poses as an antique connoisseur to hide his true identity. When he meets Dirty Ho, a witty con artist, Wang knows he has found the right man to help him untangle a royal succession plot...

programme.title: Hell Has No Boundary
programme.desc: Cheng Chung (Derek Yee) and May (Liu Hsueh-hua), a pair of lovers working on the police force, camp on an outlying island. Awakened by a strange sound, May goes out onto the beach where a violent frenzy grips her. After her return from leave, May insists Inspector Wang (Yueh Hua) in a bid to rescue some hostages. She shoots the thug under most peculiar circumstances. Then a series of tragedies occur. Her two colleagues die mangled in a lift accident and Inspector Wang is injured at his desk by a snake. Wang's exorcist sister (Hsia Ping), who performs rites for him, also dies in an accident. And so does a fortune-teller who refused to read May's fortune.

programme.title: Heroes Of Sung
programme.desc: Heroes Of Sung stars one of the original kung fu ladies of the silver screen, Shih Szu, who plays swordswoman Meng Hung. She must work with Fan Tien-Fu, played by Lo Lieh to find and protect the royal seals of the Sung Dynasty. Shih's magnificent performance earned her the female hero role in another hit Dracula And The 7 Golden Vampires.

programme.title: The Venus' Tear Diamond
programme.desc: Legendary rival jewel thieves Fragrant Night and Nocturnal Earl travel to Japan to steal the famous Venus’ Tear Diamond. They fall quickly in love at first sight, without knowing the other person is their rival and is after the same prize. Who will get the diamond, and will it mean the end of their new found love?

programme.title: The Golden Seal
programme.desc: Dai Tian Chou practices martial arts since young so he can avenge his father’s death. He meets Wu Xiao Yan who is disguised as a man one day and is suddenly beaten by a group of gangsters. Wu begs her father to allow her to take Dai back home to recover. Little does Dai know this is his chance to take revenge.

programme.title: Temple Of The Red Lotus
programme.desc: Wang Yu plays a young guy, Wu, who heads off to Dragon Valley to meet his childhood friend, Lian Chu (Chin Ping), who was promised to be his bride. When he gets there, he finds out that the family of his bride might not be an entirely honest bunch of people. Wu wishes to take Lian Chu with him, so he has no choice but to fight against her family…

programme.title: Lover'S Rock
programme.desc: Pan Lei, winner the China Literary Award for three consecutive years, wrote and directed this film about the lives and loves of a fishing village. It starred the glorious Cheng Pei-pei in her first film as a woman (she had debuted in a man’s role), and her much-lauded performance won her the prestigious Golden Accolade Award from the International Association Of Independent Producers a first for any Asian woman.

programme.title: Dragon Swamp
programme.desc: Fan is cheated by her lover Tong to steal her master’s Jade Dragon Sword. She is jailed in the Dragon Swamp as punishment and gave birth to a pair of twins - her daughter is raised by her master, while her son is taken by Tong. Twenty years later, the sword is stolen again and Fan’s daughter goes seeking for it, meeting Fan’s friend along the way.

programme.title: Sex, Love And Hate
programme.desc: This masterpiece spins three interconnected tales about Hong Kong society's differing views on love and what women want from love. Follow a trio of Hong Kong women as they explore relationships and fulfil their hopes of finding true love.

programme.title: Six Assassins
programme.desc: Lord Li Ming is a feudal tyrant who oppresses the people, and even the Emperor who is his brother, cannot stop his evil act. Righteous swordsman Mu poses as Li Ming’s guard to plan for his assassination. He arrests six assassins who have tried to kill Li Ming, before making them his allies in a secret plot to kill him and end the tyranny.

programme.title: Vengeance Of A Snow Girl
programme.desc: A crippled woman seeks vengeance against the four men who killed her parents. However, when she crosses path with a young warrior who falls in love with her, trouble ensues as his father is one of the killers responsible for her family's massacre years ago.

programme.title: Life Gamble
programme.desc: Martial arts master Yu has retired for years but is invited to join force with another master Tao to fight against the four famous thieves and retrieve the stolen Dragon Jade. However, Tao’s real plan is to possess the treasure himself and kills Yu after he defeats the thieves...

programme.title: The House Of 72 Tenants
programme.desc: The 72 inhabitants of a dilapidated tenement live under the thumb of a heartless landlady and her sleazy husband. The arrival of a defiant new tenant however, changes their fate. The residents pool their resources together to prevent evictions, deflect targeted harassment by a corrupt policeman and ultimately prevent their home from being sold.

programme.title: The Eunuch
programme.desc: A year before Lo Wei directed Bruce Lee in Fist Of Fury, he wrote and co-starred in this tale of a treacherous devil who wants nothing less than supreme power...and doesn't care if he has to murder the Emperor and use his own daughter as a deadly dupe to get it.

programme.title: Double Bliss
programme.desc: Double Bliss tells the story of two students who fall in love and want to wed, but there is one small snag: their parents don't agree! The two ingenious lovebirds come up with what they think is a foolproof plan...They play dead!

programme.title: The Thundering Sword
programme.desc: Two disciples, Yu and Zheng, are sent by their master to track down the invincible weapon “Thundering Sword” to prevent villains from getting it. Yu encounters the daughter of a ruthless clan, Chiao, who is on her way to seek for the sword. They quickly fall for each other, but when Chiao accidentally injures Zheng, things become complicated.

programme.title: The Lotus Lamp
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai plays both mother and son in this lavish fable about a goddess who falls in love with a mortal scholar (Cheng Pei-pei in her debut role). Over two years in production, it was released on the first anniversary of Linda's tragic suicide.

programme.title: Pursuit
programme.desc: This movie tells the tale of Lin Chong, the Sung Dynasty’s Chief Army Instructor who is framed by a corrupt official and has to embark on an exile fraught with danger. Helped by a monk, Lin Chong is finally able to take revenge.

programme.title: The Adulteress
programme.desc: The film is about the drugged, then disgraced wife of a peddler in the waning days of the Ching Dynasty. To make matters worse, she’s soon framed for her husband’s murder by her rapist, the son of the local magistrate! And even that is not the end of her woes in this emotional suspense…

programme.title: Heaven Sword And Dragon Sabre
programme.desc: In the Yuan Dynasty, martial artists everywhere battle for the Heaven Sword and the Dragon Sabre, as only when these two powerful weapons combine can a secret be revealed to help one become the king of the martial arts world. As Zhang Wu Ji acquires the skills from “Nine Yang Scriptures” by chance, he is also embroiled in this lengthy battle.

programme.title: Village Of Tigers
programme.desc: The devilish residents of the Village of Tigers, led by Hu Jiao, plan to kill Lo Hong Shun, otherwise known as the heroic Sword of the Southern Sky. Hu Jiao sees a way to use the righteousness of the honorable Ba family to help him kill the hero Lo by turning them against him. Will good prevail over evil?

programme.title: The Adventures Of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his people’s livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: Roving Swordsman
programme.desc: An ambitious evil clan intends to rule the martial arts world. To achieve their goal, they must first steal a secret martial arts manuscript depicting how firearms can be produced. However, a supremely intelligent swordsman Shen Sheng Yi is protecting the manuscript and remains one step ahead of the evil clan.

programme.title: Sweet And Wild
programme.desc: Fang is a spunky young village girl who is not afraid to fight back against hooligans. She gets into trouble with the biggest hoodlum Tong when she foils his plans with a maid, causing Tong to plot a revenge. Luckily a man whom she is attracted to, Hai, comes in time to her rescue. Can they fight back?

programme.title: The Kid With The Golden Arm
programme.desc: The government hires Yang to escort a cargo of gold to a famine stricken area. The vicious Chi Sha gang, with one of their best fighters, Golden Arm, announce their intention to hijack it by killing one of Yang's employees. As Yang gathers his own team of reputable fighters to protect his cargo, are they strong enough to hold off Golden Arm?

programme.title: The Merry Wife
programme.desc: A 17-year old schoolgirl marries her 35-year-old teacher. Comedy ensues when they attempt to keep their relationship a secret despite being in the same school. When they discover unwanted suitors going after their other halves, jealousy threatens to expose their marriage any minute!

programme.title: The Master Of Kung Fu
programme.desc: The famous kung fu master Wong Fei Hung teaches martial arts in Guangdong. A vicious gangster plots to trap Wong’s disciples and frames him for robbery and murder. Wong thus to fight against the culprit to prove his own innocence and take revenge for his disciples.

programme.title: The Grand Substitution
programme.desc: In this Opera epic, a loyal Imperial Court servant gives up his own newborn son to save the prince from an evil official.

programme.title: The Jade Faced Assassin
programme.desc: Two forbidden lovers, Zhang Zhen and Yue Nu, are killed by four villains and left behind their twin babies. Yue Nu's elder sister hopes to restore the clan's honour and separates the twins, arranging for them to be raised by competing clans. 18 years later, the twins meet and fight against each other, bringing chaos to the martial arts world.

programme.title: Midnight Runner
programme.desc: A true story. Jonas is one of the top runners in Switzerland. He is also a talented chef and plans to move in with Simone. But Jonas is increasingly tormented by dreams of his late brother. He begins to lead a tragic double life to overcome his despair.

programme.title: Don't Forget To Breathe
programme.desc: Klemen adores his older brother, Peter. When Peter becomes distracted with his affair with the beautiful Sonja, Klemen is angry that he’s been cast aside. At the same time, he struggles to ignore his growing obsession with Sonja’s feminine sensuality.

programme.title: King Of The Belgians
programme.desc: King Nicolas II of the Belgians is on a state visit to Istanbul when his country falls apart. With a solar storm shutting down air travel and communications, he must travel by road across the Balkans to save his country.

programme.title: Reunited
programme.desc: Two children live alone in Turkey. They are Syrian refugees whose parents are in Denmark and Canada, trapped in a bureaucratic system which reduces their interactions to Skype calls. Will they succeed in reuniting with their family?

programme.title: Road To Your Heart
programme.desc: In this sweet road-trip movie, Basson, a young businessman journeys to Cape Town for his father’s funeral and to fulfill certain tasks in the will. He meets bohemian Amory along the way and they encounter hilarious moments, disappointments and heartaches.

programme.title: Nanny On Board: In Mauritius
programme.desc: Henni is 60 years old, fun-loving and strong-willed. However, burdened with financial woes, she decides to be a nanny despite her lack of experience. Soon, she lands her first job offer from Waldner, a widowed father with two daughters, in Mauritius.

programme.title: Aydede (Road To The Moon)

programme.title: Baby Boom
programme.desc: Four couples experience the ups and downs of pregnancy. In an IVF clinic, there’s been a mix-up between 2 couples while the owners realise they’re going to be parents again in their 40s. Meanwhile, Liane wants a baby but her partner is commitment-phobic.

programme.title: Midnight Runner

programme.title: The Golden Dream
programme.desc: Juan, Sara and Samuel, all 15 years old, flee from Guatemala towards the USA. On their journey through Mexico they meet Chauk, a Tzotzil indian who does not speak Spanish and has no official documents. They believe they will find a better world beyond the USA-Mexico border but they run into a harsh reality.

programme.title: Reunited

programme.title: Take It Or Leave it
programme.desc: 30-year-old construction worker Erik suddenly finds himself a single parent when his ex-girlfriend, whom he hasn’t seen for six months, has a baby girl and informs him that she’ll put the child up for adoption unless he wants to take care of his daughter.

programme.title: Road To Your Heart
programme.desc: In this sweet road-trip movie, Basson, a young businessman journeys to Cape Town for his father’s funeral and to fulfill certain tasks in the will. He meets bohemian Amory along the way and they encounter hilarious moments, disappointments and heartaches.

programme.title: Ghost Town Anthology
programme.desc: Set in a small town in Quebec, the film centres on the inhabitants of the town who are struggling to cope after teenager Simon Dubé is killed in a car accident. As the family and town grieve, the residents begin to report several ghost sightings.

programme.title: Nanny On Board: In Mauritius
programme.desc: Henni is 60 years old, fun-loving and strong-willed. However, burdened with financial woes, she decides to be a nanny despite her lack of experience. Soon, she lands her first job offer from Waldner, a widowed father with two daughters, in Mauritius.

programme.title: Garden Lane
programme.desc: Eric and Elin were both children to drug addict parents and had traumatic childhoods. As adults, they serendipitously meet at a funeral. As they relive the ghosts of their past, they struggle to find strength in one another as they once did as kids.

programme.title: Another Love
programme.desc: After losing her husband Michi in an accident two years ago, physiotherapist Julika starts a relationship with the easy-going bicycle city guide Konstantin. With Konstantin, life is full of lightness and adventure again, but is it really love?

programme.title: Flesh Out
programme.desc: Aligned to the tradition of Mauritanian culture, young Verida’s impending arranged marriage means that she has to start gavage – a ritual of over-eating in order to gain a voluptuous body. Meal after meal, she feels increasingly estranged from her own body and starts to question her willful obedience to such rules.

programme.title: Timun Mas
programme.desc: After striking a deal with a giant, a widow sees her dream of having a child fulfilled. The child born from a giant golden fruit, who has now grown up, must fight to change her fate of being given back to the giant.

programme.title: A Summer in the Vltava
programme.desc: After initially turning down an assignment to investigate whether a child is taken care of by her father, as children are not really her thing, Sophie reconsiders it when she needs an escape after her boyfriend suggests starting a family.

programme.desc: A culinary guessing game in which bakers must decode what type of dessert was made, when all that's left are a few clues. They have to recreate the recipe and the jury will determine how closely it matches the missing dessert.

programme.title: Right At Your Door
programme.desc: With Los Angeles under sieges by toxic bombs, Brad and Lexi struggle to survive with little supply, limited time and no information.

programme.title: The Last Of The Mohicans
programme.desc: A budding romance between a British officer's daughter and an independent man who was reared as a Mohawk complicates things for the British officer, as the adopted Mohawk pursues his own agenda despite the wrath of different people.

programme.title: In The Line Of Fire
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent seeks to redeem himself by saving the life of his country's highest elected official, even if it means sacrificing his own.

programme.title: The Contractor
programme.desc: James Dial, once a top CIA assassin and now retired, is called back by the CIA to kill a terrorist leader in London But Dial learns that once his mission is accomplished, he will be next on the hit list, to remove any traces of American involvement.

programme.title: The Final Cut
programme.desc: Sometime in the future, everyone has an implant that records their every waking hour. Alan is a 'cutter' who edits this footage when a person dies. However, his latest film leaves his life at risk after he discovers a dark secret.

programme.title: Mommy Would Never Hurt You

programme.title: Got Science? 1 (S1) Ep7
programme.desc: Animals and Us - This episode explains the fascinating concept of cute aggression where animals evoke extreme emotions in human beings.

programme.title: Got Science? 1 (S1) Ep8
programme.desc: Science of Travel - People are travelling like never before. There is a rise in frequent flyers and no one wants to spend their weekends at home any more. This episode aims to cater to a world that's always on its feet.

programme.title: Dogs in the Wild: Meet the Family 1 (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Meet the Family - One family, 37 faces: from the Arctic wolf to the talkative dhole, the tiny fennec fox to the long-legged maned wolf, this is the definitive celebration of dogs in the wild.

programme.title: Kate Humble's Coastal Britain 2 (S2) Ep6
programme.desc: Hastings - Kate follows the historic East Sussex coastline, beginning on the cliffs overlooking Hastings, a town associated with the Battle of 1066.

programme.title: Extinction - The Facts
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough and a cast of world leading scientists bring us the facts behind the current extinction crisis. Revealing what extinction is, what is happening now, why it is happening and what could happen in the future.

programme.title: Robson Green's Extreme Fishing Challenge 2 (S2) Ep8
programme.desc: Mauritius - In this episode Robson heads to Mauritius - a country famous for honeymooning couples - but he's going to fish.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Geladas of Ethiopia - Geladas are only found among the peaks and plateaus of Ethiopias Simien Mountains, an ancient range of incredible beauty and biodiversity. We follow the Mountain Band of Geladas as they make their daily migration from the cliff edge to the mountaintop.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Hollywoods Held Hostage - During the last few weeks of the dry season, the prides stick close to the only available water in the river. But in Luangwa, that proximity spells danger - especially when the scent of a hippo kill compels the Hollywoods to cross the river.

programme.title: Over Australia 1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Great Divide - Created by titanic forces and spanning 3,700 km along the eastern edge of Australia, the Great Dividing Range separates two very different worlds. Aerial footage and intimate studies reveal how species survive and thrive in this mountain home.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Bay of Fundy - Step into the Bay of Fundy’s surging waters. Learn how this east coast ecosystem sustains an abundance of creatures, including hundreds of thousands of seabirds, the world’s fastest predator, and a complex web of invertebrates.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Wales - Travel along the west coast of Great Britain, where the world’s longest uninterrupted footpath forges through more than 800 miles of breathtaking scenery. This majestic coast teems with wildlife, geological mysteries, and centuries of human history.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Episode 4 - When a baby mink is abandoned in a store, the team gets to work on some behavioural training. But will this sweet little one be tough enough for the wild when they’re done? Visit with a mange-afflicted coyote who’s enjoying some alone time to heal.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Gardens in the Clouds - The ancient plants and animals of the Cloud Mountains of South Africa have long captured people’s imagination. It’s a landscape defined by weather and threatened by invaders. But these mountains are not only a sanctuary for life in the present; they also offer a fascinating window into our past.

programme.title: Wild Rockies 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Waterways - Some of mightiest rivers in North America originate on the glacial heights of the Rocky Mountains. The lakes, rivers and marshes of the Rockies are like arteries pulsing through the landscape, feeding the creatures that call the mountains home. Fed by glaciers and motivated by gravity, these waterways are split by the massive Rockies, which divert flow into the Atlantic, Pacific, and Arctic Oceans. From the uninhabitable icy pecks, water melts off glaciers, runs down thunderous waterfalls, filters through wetlands, sculpts the terrain, and finally flows out to the ocean, sustaining life and transforming environments along the way.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Baboons of Bambelela - With power in numbers, adaptability and intelligent leadership, the Bambelela baboon troop is an excellent example of why baboons thrive throughout Africa. Their highly refined social behavior and organization mirror much of human society and show just how alike we are to our primate cousins.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Geladas of Ethiopia - Geladas are only found among the peaks and plateaus of Ethiopias Simien Mountains, an ancient range of incredible beauty and biodiversity. We follow the Mountain Band of Geladas as they make their daily migration from the cliff edge to the mountaintop.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Hollywoods Held Hostage - During the last few weeks of the dry season, the prides stick close to the only available water in the river. But in Luangwa, that proximity spells danger - especially when the scent of a hippo kill compels the Hollywoods to cross the river.

programme.title: Over Australia 1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Great Divide - Created by titanic forces and spanning 3,700 km along the eastern edge of Australia, the Great Dividing Range separates two very different worlds. Aerial footage and intimate studies reveal how species survive and thrive in this mountain home.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Bay of Fundy - Step into the Bay of Fundy’s surging waters. Learn how this east coast ecosystem sustains an abundance of creatures, including hundreds of thousands of seabirds, the world’s fastest predator, and a complex web of invertebrates.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Wales - Travel along the west coast of Great Britain, where the world’s longest uninterrupted footpath forges through more than 800 miles of breathtaking scenery. This majestic coast teems with wildlife, geological mysteries, and centuries of human history.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Gardens in the Clouds - The ancient plants and animals of the Cloud Mountains of South Africa have long captured people’s imagination. It’s a landscape defined by weather and threatened by invaders. But these mountains are not only a sanctuary for life in the present; they also offer a fascinating window into our past.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Episode 5 - A curious raccoon sticks his head a little too far into a peanut butter jar on a sweltering summer day in Toronto. See how the team gets him out of this sticky situation. Then cheer on a painted turtle who needs emergency eye surgery.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Baboons of Bambelela - With power in numbers, adaptability and intelligent leadership, the Bambelela baboon troop is an excellent example of why baboons thrive throughout Africa. Their highly refined social behavior and organization mirror much of human society and show just how alike we are to our primate cousins.

programme.desc: Wales - Travel along the west coast of Great Britain, where the world’s longest uninterrupted footpath forges through more than 800 miles of breathtaking scenery. This majestic coast teems with wildlife, geological mysteries, and centuries of human history.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Episode 6 - Follow the medical and rehab teams at Toronto Wildlife Centre as they work to clear a rescued fox of mange and return it to the wild. Elsewhere in the center, meet scores of injured songbirds that have hit downtown buildings on their way south.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Episode 7 - Follow along as the wildlife rehab team works to treat a baby raccoon, separated from his family, and get him back in the wild before his parents move on. In another part of the center, watch as an orphaned killdeer is introduced to...himself?

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Sandveld: Land of Contrasts - A narrow and harsh belt of western coastline in southern Africa is a land of contrasts where creatures are forced to adapt to survive. Meet the quirky and charismatic inhabitants that call this fragile interplay between land and ocean home.

programme.title: Wild Rockies 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Balancing the Forest - Survival in the forest means maintaining a delicate balance between growth and destruction and death and rebirth - a forest should be in a constant state of regeneration. When trees get too tall they block all the sunlight from hitting the ground, which means grasses and smaller shrubs can’t grow, diminishing habitat for animals like elk, moose, caribou, and wolves.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Next Dynasty - The all-female Hollywood pride have been in exile after being attacked by the four Nomad brothers. But their leader, Ava, decides to lead her family south to the heart of their territory for a showdown with the Nomads.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Dry Season - The dry season is the toughest time of year. With lower water levels and less space, animals need to quickly learn new skills to survive…and if they don’t, predatory vultures will swoop in for a feast.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Bay of Fundy - Step into the Bay of Fundy’s surging waters. Learn how this east coast ecosystem sustains an abundance of creatures, including hundreds of thousands of seabirds, the world’s fastest predator, and a complex web of invertebrates.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Spring - It’s spring: the season of courtship and new life. Witness nature awaken from its slumber in many forms, from the blossoms that explode in the rain-soaked desert of Arizona to the fuzzy wood ducklings that leap from their nests.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Summer - Summer brings long, warm days for wildlife to thrive. Watch animals learn new skills, compete for mates, and escape predators as they try to make the most of the short season.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Spring - It’s spring: the season of courtship and new life. Witness nature awaken from its slumber in many forms, from the blossoms that explode in the rain-soaked desert of Arizona to the fuzzy wood ducklings that leap from their nests.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Summer - Summer brings long, warm days for wildlife to thrive. Watch animals learn new skills, compete for mates, and escape predators as they try to make the most of the short season.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Episode 8 - Join the rescue team as they respond to a call about an opossum stuck in a fence that turns out not to be the kind of animal that plays dead. Inside the center, a goose with a serious foot injury receives physiotherapy before returning to the wild.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep9
programme.desc: Episode 9 - Follow an injured opossum into surgery, as the medical team realizes amputation may be the only way to save his badly injured toe. And meet some turtle hatchlings who seem ready for release when the team gets disappointing details about their size.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Namaqualand: the Desert Bloom - For most of the year it’s a desert, but during early August and September the dusty valleys of Namaqualand transform into a wonderland carpeted with wildflowers. Witness this magnificent transformation from arid desert to beautiful oasis.

programme.title: Wild Rockies 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Group Survival - For a great many species, the structures of group living are the most important for survival. Although social living is integral to many of the animals that call the Rocky Mountains home, no two species organize their society in the same way. Even among closely related species there can be drastic differences in social structure; communication, hierarchy, mating, and diet are all inextricably informed by specific environmental and genetic adaptations for group survival.

programme.title: Deadly Australians 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Deserts - Behind the facade of Australia’s dramatic scenery is a motley crew of silent assassins, con artists, gang members and brutal brawlers, vying for supremacy amidst the harsh, dry and desolate Australian desert. Competition for resources is so fierce, its animal residents have developed some ingenious methods of survival.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Jungle Juniors - Every year, more than 200,000 monkeys in Peru are trafficked illegally. Almost all are babies. Watch as these little ones learn to survive without their moms and try to make new friends along the way.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Spring - It’s spring: the season of courtship and new life. Witness nature awaken from its slumber in many forms, from the blossoms that explode in the rain-soaked desert of Arizona to the fuzzy wood ducklings that leap from their nests.

programme.desc: Jungle Juniors - Every year, more than 200,000 monkeys in Peru are trafficked illegally. Almost all are babies. Watch as these little ones learn to survive without their moms and try to make new friends along the way.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Haven of Giants - Lewa Conservancy is working to return elephants to territory from Mt. Kenya to Samburu National Park. They've also created an elephant exclusion zone to try and restore a damaged ecosystem. Radio tracking collars are used for both initiatives to help conservationists better understand the elephants’ needs - and to see if they're returning to their natural corridors.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Ivory Wars - Elephant hunting has been banned in Kenya for 40 years. Organized gangs of armed poachers are still targeting elephants, illegally hunting them and selling their ivory tusks on the black market. Environmentalists and conservationists are sounding the alarm.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Episode 8 - Join the rescue team as they respond to a call about an opossum stuck in a fence that turns out not to be the kind of animal that plays dead. Inside the center, a goose with a serious foot injury receives physiotherapy before returning to the wild.

programme.desc: Ivory Wars - Elephant hunting has been banned in Kenya for 40 years. Organized gangs of armed poachers are still targeting elephants, illegally hunting them and selling their ivory tusks on the black market. Environmentalists and conservationists are sounding the alarm.

programme.title: Nigella's Cook, Eat, Repeat (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: After creating a warm, spicy and aromatic dish of lamb shanks with wide noodles, Nigella turns her attention to very ripe bananas, which she uses to make a gloriously rich and gooey chocolate tahini pudding, and then goes on to create a warming curry with a surprising ingredient.

programme.title: Your Home, Made Perfect (S3) Ep1
programme.desc: Shelley and Steven - Architects Laura Jane Clark and Julian McIntosh compete using virtual reality to remodel a south London semi. Will the finished build create the spectacular home the owners crave?

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby (S4) Ep5
programme.desc: Qasr Al Sarab, Abu Dhabi - Surrounded as far as they eye can see by vast sand dunes and scorching heat, guests relax in palatial comfort with swimming pools, huge baths and lush gardens. Giles and Monica explore how all this water use is made possible and meet the staff who are coping with living and providing hotel service in such an extreme environment.

programme.title: George Clarke's Remarkable Renovations (S2) Ep3
programme.desc: Glassworks, Brighton - George meets James, who's had a 15-year love-affair with a former glassworks in Brighton. With grand plans to restore the whole property, will his vision live up to his high expectations?

programme.title: The Great Cookbook Challenge with Jamie Oliver (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: From home cooks and professional chefs, to Instagrammers and those who just love cooking for their family and friends, the first six cooks pitch their book ideas and their dishes to the judges.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off (S9) Ep7
programme.desc: Vegan Week - It's a Bake Off first with Vegan week, including a savoury pastry Signature without butter, a cracking Technical, and a risky but spectacular Showstopper.

programme.title: Your Home, Made Perfect (S3) Ep1
programme.desc: Shelley and Steven - Architects Laura Jane Clark and Julian McIntosh compete using virtual reality to remodel a south London semi. Will the finished build create the spectacular home the owners crave?

programme.title: The Great Cookbook Challenge with Jamie Oliver (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: From home cooks and professional chefs, to Instagrammers and those who just love cooking for their family and friends, the first six cooks pitch their book ideas and their dishes to the judges.

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby (S4) Ep6
programme.desc: The Lanesborough, London - In the final episode of the series Monica Galetti and Giles Coren visit The Lanesborough in London, the first time the hotel has allowed cameras to film behind the scenes. Set discreetly in a historic building on London's Hyde Park Corner, suites are often rented for months at a time and every room comes with 24-hour dedicated butler ​service. ​Despite its extreme luxury, Giles and Monica discover a friendly staff that make staying at The Lanesborough feel like being home from home for their wealthy and famous guests.

programme.title: Donal's Asian Baking Adventure (S1) Ep6
programme.desc: Tokyo - In Tokyo Donal visits Asakusa Market surrounding the world's most popular religious site, the Buddhist temple of Sensoji. Inspired by the green tea flavours he finds there, he searches out the Koso-an tea house, one of Tokyo's hidden gems.

programme.title: Paul Hollywood Eats Japan (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Okinawa, Kyoto and Hiroshima - Paul Hollywood continues his culinary journey across Japan. He boards the bullet train, visits Okinawa and gets a cookery lesson from an atomic bomb survivor in Hiroshima.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off (S9) Ep8
programme.desc: Danish Week - The bakers face unfamiliar recipes as they battle to impress Prue Leith and Paul Hollywood. There's a bread challenge Signature where they must demonstrate style as well substance.

programme.title: Grand Designs: House of the Year (S6) Ep2
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud, Damion Burrows and Michelle Ogundehin explore five houses demonstrating exceptional craftsmanship, including a Scandi-Scottish lochside bolthole.

programme.title: Donal's Asian Baking Adventure (S1) Ep6
programme.desc: Tokyo - In Tokyo Donal visits Asakusa Market surrounding the world's most popular religious site, the Buddhist temple of Sensoji. Inspired by the green tea flavours he finds there, he searches out the Koso-an tea house, one of Tokyo's hidden gems.

programme.title: Paul Hollywood Eats Japan (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Okinawa, Kyoto and Hiroshima - Paul Hollywood continues his culinary journey across Japan. He boards the bullet train, visits Okinawa and gets a cookery lesson from an atomic bomb survivor in Hiroshima.

programme.title: World's Most Luxurious (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: Homes - Join us as we take a look at a world of different luxuries each week. In this episode, we get to peek inside the world's most luxurious homes.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall (S1) Ep7
programme.desc: Rick explores one of Cornwall's hidden secrets, the secluded and stunning Fowey Estuary. Later on, he makes a delicious pancake with a wild blackberry compote and Cornish clotted cream.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off (S9) Ep8
programme.desc: Danish Week - The bakers face unfamiliar recipes as they battle to impress Prue Leith and Paul Hollywood. There's a bread challenge Signature where they must demonstrate style as well substance.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep40
programme.desc: Something Old, Something New / The Ghoster - Archibald stumbles into playing the part of a wedding planner as he attempts to help a frazzled groom pull off the perfect day. / Archibald unknowingly buys a haunted toaster and summons a ghost by mistake.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep48
programme.desc: Caverns And Creepers / Rad Teacher - When Eep is kicked out of Thunk's new imaginary role-playing adventure game she decides to play her own, real version of the game; Fed up with Squawk's mean teaching style, Eep has Grug fire him and replace him with Rad, the quintessential young, cool teacher

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep21
programme.desc: Lucky And The Impatient Patient - While Spirit recovers from his injuries, Lucky helps out at the soda shop.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep47
programme.desc: Misadventureland Part 1 / Misadventureland Part 2 - Richie brings Lotta’s dream of a Horn-A-World theme park to life -- complete with actual Horn-A-Corns! But the reality is a bit of a nightmare.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep47
programme.desc: Best Frenemies/The Jamaican Jerk Chickens - Skidmark gets jealous when White Shadow and Turbo become best friends; the crew must race as a bobsled team against the favored Jamaican Chickens.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep3
programme.desc: You (Don'T) Snooze, You Lose / Save The Squasher - When the crew takes on a mission to help Ian get some rest for a Badminton Tournament, Jax realises that the biggest approach isn't always the best approach. / When Lula loses her comic book, Ari learns that the best heroes rely on teamwork and not gadgets.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep40
programme.desc: Something Old, Something New / The Ghoster - Archibald stumbles into playing the part of a wedding planner as he attempts to help a frazzled groom pull off the perfect day. / Archibald unknowingly buys a haunted toaster and summons a ghost by mistake.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep13
programme.desc: Model Behavior / Pillow Fight Club - Satin and Chenille put on a fashion show to impress the trendsetter of Troll VillagePoppy and Branch start a massive villagewide pillow battle to determine who gets the pillow of destiny.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep2
programme.desc: Colossal Strawberry/The Sappening - When Berry sees a "giant strawberry," she's convinced that the prophecy of the berry colossus has com e true and that she's been chosen to lead her people to their true calling. Rocksy, meanwhile, is devastated that her friend is leaving, unti she realizes the strawberry is actually a pinata and Berry is in danger! / Twig is afraid his sapping will put the Mighty Ones in peril, but Rocksy aims to show him that his sap can be used for good.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep65
programme.desc: A Savage Place - After winning the trust of the Zephilim, Puss storms the Blind King's castle in hopes of saving his friends, restoring the true ruler of the Netherworld, and blocking the Portal for good

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep39
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Polarizing Plight Of The Pitiless Poopetrators - George and Harold want Cash Networth to buy the camp and fire Krupp. But before he'll agree to pony up the dough, Cash has a small request of his own.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep42
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Senseless Torment Of The Space Toilet - Inspired by their favorite TV show, George and Harold — along with Principal Krupp — blast off to outer space, where an angry toilet awaits.

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep51
programme.desc: Shell Shocked Part 1 - Hiccup doesn't know who to trust when Viggo and Ryker each tell him that the other has gone rogue, and is sidetracked when a new dragon attacks.

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep52
programme.desc: Shell Shocked Part 2 - An extremely powerful new dragon attacks Dragon's Edge, and Hiccup makes a dangerous alliance while the fate of the Dragon Eye hangs in the balance.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep4
programme.desc: Formula For Menace: A Dekker Moonboots Mystery - When Baby Corp babies start aging, panic hits the office and the babies set out to find out if someone has been tainting the formula

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep5
programme.desc: Monster Machine - The annual baby pageant approaches, but Staci’s plan to win may have a negative effect

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep25
programme.desc: Coronation Of The Iron Goddess - When things don't quite go according to plan, Po and the Kids must rally with other allies to save the Empress and protect China.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep26
programme.desc: The Invincible Armour - Po and the Kids are put to the ultimate test, and must use all their knowledge and skills in order to defeat The White Bone Demon.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep28
programme.desc: Red Paladin - A new leader of Voltron must be found before Lotor's forces attack.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep28
programme.desc: Deus Ex Monkhuaha / Slak Attack - Sandy becomes jealous when the family gets an adorable monkhuahua/Eep and Thunk act like lazy “slaks” instead of doing their schoolwork and chores

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep28
programme.desc: Where The Koobish Roam / Best Friendiversary - On a Koobish cattle drive together, Tip and Krunkle's differences result in Oh and the herd getting lost in a stampede; Tip and Oh can't agree on how to celebrate their Friendiversary

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep28
programme.desc: Jump The Whale Shark / Frederic Bartholdi - When Sherman's friends crash the show for an impromptu beach party, he and his rival both do a trick jump over a whale shark to win over a girl

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep28
programme.desc: Lucky And The No-Good Outlaw Butch Lepray - Lucky gets into trouble when the circus picks up a stranded woman who isn't what she seems

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep15
programme.desc: No Can Do / Adopt-A-Toad - Chet is determined to open a giant can of tomato juice lands in town and Turbo worries that Chet is becoming obsessed with the can. // Turbo donates his race winnings an animal charity, but accidentally adopts a toad who moves into the clubhouse and becomes an obnoxious house guest.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep3
programme.desc: Why Hippo Has No Hair - You see there was a time when Hippo did have hair… lots of hair! She was always harumphingly hot. Then one hot night while Hippo was sleeping a spark from the fire caught the end of her hairy tail! Hippo was on fire! She ran through the bush until SPLOSH! Hippo jumped in the waterhole. And from that day on Hippo stayed in the cool waters without a single hair on her hide. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep4
programme.desc: Why Tortoise Has A Broken Shell - You see there was a time when Tortoise's shell was all shiny and smooth. One day Tortoise discovered the birds were having a Feast in the Heavens and he tricked the Birds into making him a pair of wings. Greedy Tortoise raced the birds beyond the clouds and scoffed the whole feastt! When the Birds found out Tortoise had to jump off a cloud until BOOF!!! He landed on his shiny shell. All the animals pieced Tortoise's shell back together but from that day on Tortoise's shell was all bumpy and broken and he never moved speedily again. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep55
programme.desc: Count On Fifi - Fifi and Bumble deliver lots of delicious honey to Poppy's stall. They lose a pot on the way and there isn't enough to go round. Can they find the missing pot, or will Stingo have to go without his honey for tea?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep56
programme.desc: Poppy The Line Dancing Queen - Poppy is having a line dancing party, but none of the other flowertots know how to do it. Will any of them learn to dance in time or will Poppy have to cancel the party?

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep3
programme.desc: What'S Happened To Chloe The Caterpillar? - Jess wants to introduce Willow to his new friend, Chloe the caterpillar. But where's Chloe gone? He searches for her in all the places she might be, where he's visited her before, where there might be juicey leaves she'd like to eat but it's not until a butterfly breaks out of a little Chloe-shaped-sack that Jess realises that Chloe's just changed!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep4
programme.desc: When Will My Coloured Stripes Come Back? - Jess is playing puddle jumping, dodging the rain to have fun on a gloomy day when suddenly, just as the rain's stopping, the sun comes out and at the same time he sees a beautiful rainbow in the sky. He's desperate to show his friends, and it's not until he works out you need sunshine and rain at the same time to make a rainbow that he can show his friends the beautiful coloured shape in the sky.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep41
programme.desc: Extreme Sleepover Club / Vega Swift - Smidge, Guy, Cooper, and Biggie throw an impromptu sleepover in the Fun Factory. But when unexpected visitors show up, will they avoid getting in trouble?/ Satin and Chenille are tasked with babysitting Luna Swift, Nova’s toddler niece. But she proves to be a bit of a handful

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep5
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Terrifying Perilous Misfortune Of The T.P. Mummy - After George and Harold T.P. the entire school with toilet paper, they are forced to flush it all down the toilet causing a giant explosion that turns the French teacher into the T.P. Mummy

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep6
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Squishy Predicament Of Stanley Peet'S Stinky Pits - When George and Harold want to win the school Avocadgrow contest, they accidentally turn their science teacher into a giant avocado monster

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep48
programme.desc: Teambuilding - The combined villains have taken over Baby Corp HQ, and a disastrous chupie teleportation accident has all the office babies scattered to the wind. Boss has to regain his leadership gusto to convince Baby Corp to regroup, as Tim and Danny share an emotional last day together before Danny leaves town for good.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep49
programme.desc: Theo 100 - With the Baby Corp babies exiled from their office and hiding in the Templeton basement, Boss and a trusted team storm Baby Corp to take it back from the villains. Having decided to retire and pass the CEO-ship onto to Staci, he also prepares Tim for her new life as an older brother to just a normal baby brother.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep74
programme.desc: Not A Date - When Puss and Dulcinea go on a vacation with all the San Lorenzans tagging along, thieves show up and El Moco takes them captive

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep48
programme.desc: Apple Of My Ire/Funsgiving - After all their adventures, Branch no longer finds Cloud Guy as annoying as he once did. But to Cloud Guy, this is an unacceptable betrayal of their adversarial relationship. Dejected, he sets out to find a new rival to annoy./Biggie is hosting Funsgiving this year, and is therefore charged with preparing all of the best dishes for his friends. But in his quest to make things perfect, he goes a little too far…

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep48
programme.desc: The Panchurian Candidate - After Uncle King Julien turned Pancho into a deadly killer so he could take back his throne, King Julien must save the kingdom before it's too late

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep8
programme.desc: Costa Rica... In Color! - When Wizard Whitebeard receives a postcard from Costa Rica, Wenda -- a bird-lover with an encyclopedic knowledge of rare birds -- notices that the birds in the postcard have lost their color! Wally and Wenda head to the Costa Rican rain forest to investigate alongside Wizard Featherbeard.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep2
programme.desc: Dark Park Bark Lark \ The Fast And The Curious - Tag and Scooch team up to get all of Scooch's chores done in time for the Barkapellas Bark In the Park In the Dark concert. \ Tag is so excited to join the Sam Whippet’s Race Cadets. But when Tag and Scooch show up at the racetrack, there’s lots of competition. And to complete the first challenge - a pedal car race - they’re going to have to work together.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep4
programme.desc: Gopher It! / A Glamping We Will Go - When a pesky gopher gets in the way of Fawna making her famous veggie stew, Niah learns to not let a bad experience, get in the way of doing good. / When the inexperienced Rona has to step in for Donna, the team makes sure everyone has the best camping trip ever.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep6

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep5
programme.desc: Why Hen Pecks The Ground - You see there was a time when Hen didn't peck the ground. She was a proud mother who spent all her time looking after and cleaning her chicks. Fancy pancy Peacock upsets Mama Hen and makes her feel plain. All the animals are furious with Snooty Peacock… but the damage has been done. Eagle – Mama Hen's best friend – decides to lend Hen her most prized possession – A needle! And Mama Hen sews herself the most beautiful coat of new feathers. Everyone is delighted and they dance and dance and dance. But Mama Hen forgets all about the needle and it gets lost in all the dust. Eagle's precious needle! From that day on Hen always pecks the ground looking for the needle to return to her friend. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep6
programme.desc: Why Bat Hangs Upside Down - You see there was a time when Bat didn't hang upside down. He used to fly all over Tinga Tinga, saying ‘Boo!' to all the animals and giving them a fright. Nothing could be more fun for Bat. But one day Bat went too far… and the animals decided to give Bat a dose of his own medicine. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep57
programme.desc: King Stingo - Aunt Tulip has lost Grubby again. When Stingo finds him, he asks to be made King as a reward. It isn't long before he has gone too far and the tots are all fed up with his demands. Can Fifi get life in the garden back to normal?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep58
programme.desc: Hide And Seek - The tots are playing hide and seek and the winner will get Fifi's delicious jam tarts. Who will win, Stingo and Slugsy are sure it will be them!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep5
programme.desc: Who Did I Hear In The Big Hollow Log? - Jess is searching for Horace by the pond but he's nowhere to be found. When he calls into a hollow log and his voice echo's back, Jess thinks it's the voice of a new friend and sets about trying to work out where the friend is. By using comparisons and clever thinking, Jess works out that it's not someone else - it's his voice bouncing off the log. It's an echo,

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep6
programme.desc: What Can We Do With Mimi'S Rubbish? - Jess is off to play painting and gluing with his pink rabbit friend Mimi. He's very excited. But when he arrives Mimi's hutch is overflowing with rubbish and there's no space for their art project. Jess works out how to get the rubbish out of the hutch using recyclling re-using and re-pairing.
